title: "2015-05: Doesn't He Have Intern-Elves For This?"
format: html
---

```{r}
df <- readLines("input.txt")
```

## Part 1

```{r}
dt <- df
dt <- dt[!grepl("(ab)|(cd)|(pq)|(xy)", dt)]
dt <- dt[grepl("(\\w*[aeuio]\\w*){3,}", dt)]
dt <- dt[grepl("(.)\\1+", dt)]
length(dt)
```

## Part 2

```{r}
dt <- df
dt <- dt[grepl("(..).*(\\1)", dt, perl = TRUE)]
dt <- dt[grepl("(.)(.)(\\1)", dt, perl = TRUE)]
length(dt)
```
